name: Phototrap
description:
Pilot a microscopic machine and collect fuel as you dodge lasers!

This is my 11th game and 1st One Game a Week project. Keep up with my weekly projects through my website at abecker.me/games and connect with me on Twitter @becker929. If you're interested in a Linux, Mac, or 32-bit Windows build, hit me up and be my guinea pig ;D
